com.codepoetics.fluvius.api - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api
Provides the top-level Fluvius API.

Interfaces for compilers which compile Flows into a FlowExecutions.

Interfaces pertaining to describing and writing descriptions of Flows.

Functional interfaces for use in assembling Flows.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.history
API for storing and retrieving flow trace information, in the form of FlowEvents emitted during flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging
Logging API for Flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad
Defines the "scratchpad" abstraction which represents the working state of a Flow.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.
com.codepoetics.fluvius.exceptions - package com.codepoetics.fluvius.exceptions
Defines some custom exceptions emitted by Flows.

K

Key<T> - Interface in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad
A Key identifies a value written into a Scratchpad, and is used to construct new key/value pairs to be added to a Scratchpad.
KeyValue - Interface in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad
A pair of a Key and an associated value, which may be added to a Scratchpad's storage.
